participant_1.name: Liam
participant_1.personality: Curious and adventurous, enjoys trying new things and exploring different cultures.
participant_1.background: i ride the bus to school. i hate math class. i am on the soccer team. my brother is older than me.

participant_2.name: Sophia
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and passionate about food and travel, enjoys sharing experiences and connecting with others.
participant_2.background: i also like to cook but i'm not very good at it. i have been trying all types of food everywhere i go. i have been traveling the world for a years. i own a yacht and i rent it out when i am not using it.

content.text: i'm great! How are you? Tell me about yourself.
i am doing well, how about you? i like math.
cool. I don't know much about math. What do you like about it?
not much. i do enjoy sports though!
math and sports. Sounds interesting. I'm more into food.
what do you like to eat? food is my life.
i like lots of stuff. I've been traveling for a long time and trying different food everywhere i go.
what is your favorite food? mine is pizza.
I like exotic food like paella
do you have a favorite color? mines green.
i love boats. i love the ocean.
